Package com.intellij.openapi.project

Class ProjectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.project.ProjectManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectManagerEx

    public abstract class ProjectManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides project management.

      • getOpenProjects

        public abstract Project [] getOpenProjects()
        Returns the list of currently opened projects. ComponentManager.isDisposed() must be checked for each project before use (if the whole operation is not under read action).

      • getDefaultProject

        public abstract Project getDefaultProject()
        Returns the project which is used as a template for new projects. The template project is always available, even when no other project is open. This Project instance is not supposed to be used for anything except template settings storage.

        NB: default project can be lazy loaded

        Returns:
        the template project instance.

      • loadAndOpenProject

        public abstract Project loadAndOpenProject(java.lang.String filePath)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           JDOMException
        Loads and opens a project with the specified path. If the project file is from an older IDEA version, prompts the user to convert it to the latest version. If the project file is from a newer version, shows a message box telling the user that the load failed.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the .ipr file path
        Returns:
        the opened project file, or null if the project failed to load because of version mismatch or because the project is already open.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the project file was not found or failed to read
        JDOMException - if the project file contained invalid XML

      • loadAndOpenProject

        public Project loadAndOpenProject(java.io.File file)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  JDOMException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JDOMException

                                           JDOMException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        JDOMException

      • closeProject

        public abstract boolean closeProject(Project project)
        Closes the specified project, but does not dispose it.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to close.
        Returns:
        true if the project was closed successfully, false if the closing was disallowed by the close listeners.

      • reloadProject

        public abstract void reloadProject(Project project)
        Asynchronously reloads the specified project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to reload.

      • createProject

        public abstract Project createProject(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String path)
        Create new project in given location.
        Parameters:
        name - project name
        path - project location
        Returns:
        newly crated project
